ANDRADE (2022) Description of the female and redescription of the male of Sciopemyia sordellii (Shannon & Del Ponte, 1927), including the description of four new species of the genus Sciopemyia Barretto, 1962 (Diptera

sec.title: N/A
sec.p: SALVADOR P. CHAVES JÚNIOR, PALOMA H. F. SHIMABUKURO & ANDREY J. ANDRADE ( 2022 ) Description of the female and redescription of the male of Sciopemyia sordellii (Shannon & Del Ponte, 1927), including the description of four new species of the genus Sciopemyia Barretto, 1962 (Diptera: Psychodidae: Phlebotominae) from Brazil . Zootaxa , 5195 ( 4 ): 301–336 .
On page 317, in Etymology of the new species Sciopemyia dantastorresi the first name of the Dr. Filipe is writed as Dr. Felipe. The correction desired is assigned in bold.

Previous version: Etymology: The species name pays homage to Dr. Felipe Dantas Torres, “Instituto Aggeu Magalh„es”, Fiocruz, Pernambuco , for his important contribution in the studies of leishmaniases and infectious diseases in Brazil .

Corrected version: Etymology: The species name pays homage to Dr. F i lipe Dantas Torres, “Instituto Aggeu Magalh„es”, Fiocruz, Pernambuco , for his important contribution in the studies of leishmaniases and infectious diseases in Brazil .
